title: Action Platformer Music Pack
longDescription:
Link to the demos!


A collection of 10 hard rock/heavy metal tracks, inspired in classic action platformer games. The music has a strong, exciting and energetic mood that will fit any action oriented, racing or battle games.

It was written for electric guitars, electric bass, synthesizers and drums. Also available in 16-bit version “16-bit Action Platformer Music Pack”


This pack includes 10 tracks, each with a loop edit for convenience: 

All tracks are .wav, 44.1kHz, 16 bits


  • Achieving Victory (2:00)
  • Achieving Victory - Loop (1:48)
  • Against the Enemy (2:15)
  • Against the Enemy - Loop (2:08)
  • Back Into Action (2:30)
  • Back Into Action - Loop (2:22)
  • Enemy Ahead (2:07)
  • Enemy Ahead - Loop (2:02)
  • Enemy Fortress (2:12)
  • Enemy Fortress - Loop (2:04)
  • Gathering Strength (2:10)
  • Gathering Strength - Loop (2:06)
  • Overcoming Obstacles (2:04)
  • Overcoming Obstacles - Loop (2:00)
  • Righteous Battle (2:01)
  • Righteous Battle - Loop (1:56)
  • Saving the City (1:52)
  • Saving the City - Loop (1:48)
  • Strong Foe (2:12)
  • Strong Foe - Loop (2:08)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 High quality hard rock/metal tracks
  •  10 loop edits


Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1kHz/16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 41:53 (including loop edits)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
